synopsis.text: Missing dessert and a disrupted morning routine set the stage for a thrilling culinary conundrum in the animated short, "Detective Pikachu & the Mystery of the Missing Flan." Tim's beloved flan has vanished without a trace, leaving him distraught and in need of assistance. Enter Detective Pikachu, the world-renowned Pok√©mon sleuth, who, despite his initial plans for filming his morning routine, rises to the challenge. With few suspects and an insatiable hunger for justice (and flan), Detective Pikachu and Tim form an unstoppable duo, determined to crack the case and recover the delectable dessert. Will their combined efforts and electrifying detective skills save the day? Join them on their exciting adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
